mapper.sql: select id, reward_type, reward_amount, reward_name, cart_id, car_brand, province, city, images, create_time, end_time, description, reward_status, user_id
mapper.insert: insert into cr_reward ( reward_type, reward_amount, reward_name, cart_id, car_brand, province, city, images, create_time, end_time, description, reward_status, user_id ) values ( #{rewardType}, #{rewardAmount}, #{rewardName}, #{cartId}, #{carBrand}, #{province}, #{city}, #{images}, #{createTime}, #{endTime}, #{description}, #{rewardStatus}, #{userId} )
mapper.update: update cr_reward set reward_type = #{rewardType}, reward_amount = #{rewardAmount}, reward_name = #{rewardName}, cart_id = #{cartId}, car_brand = #{carBrand}, province = #{province}, city = #{city}, images = #{images}, end_time = #{endTime}, description = #{description} where id = #{id}
